title: Anthropic warns of first reported AI-driven hacking campaign linked to China
description: The attack, aimed at around 30 global targets, was notable for the extent to which artificial intelligence was used to automate the work.
content:
A team of researchers has uncovered what they say is the first reported use of artificial intelligence to direct a hacking campaign in a largely automated fashion.
The AI company Anthropic said this week that it disrupted a cyber operation that its r... [846 chars]

title: Morgan Freeman threatens legal action over AI use of his voice: 'You’re robbing me'
description: Morgan Freeman said his lawyers are already tackling unauthorized artificial intelligence (AI) uses of his voice that have left the actor displeased.
content:
Morgan Freeman said his lawyers are already “very, very busy” tackling unauthorized artificial intelligence (AI) uses of his voice that have left the actor feeling “a little PO’d.”
“Many, yeah. Quite a few,” Freeman told The Guardian on Monday when a... [2106 chars]

title: Japan's draft AI guidelines call for curbing deepfakes, building literacy
description: Japan's new guidelines for the appropriate use of artificial intelligence will urge companies to curb "deepfakes" and other misleading outputs, while encouraging users to build AI literacy, according to a draft outline. The guidelines, which would not be legally binding, also call on operators to ensure transparency by disclosing necessary…
content:

title: Morgan Freeman Says He's 'a Little PO'd' Over AI Replicas of His Voice
description: Morgan Freeman said in a new interview that he is "a little PO'd" about the apparent use of artificial intelligence to replicate his distinctive voice.
content:
Morgan Freeman is unhappy that people are apparently using artificial intelligence to replicate his voice.
Freeman, 88, told The Guardian that he is "a little PO'd, you know," about the issue during an interview published Monday, Nov. 10, while promo... [2220 chars]

title: Oracle bonds sell off as AI investment fuels investor concerns
description: Oracle Corp bonds have taken a hit in recent days following a report that the cloud and artificial intelligence service provider plans to add another $38 billion to its heavy debt load to fund its AI infrastructure, according to analysts and investors.
content: Nov 14 (Reuters) - Oracle Corp bonds have taken a hit in recent days following a report that the cloud and artificial intelligence service provider plans to add another $38 billion to its heavy debt load to fund its AI infrastructure, according to an... [2133 chars]
